summary: Escalated complaint about unresolved sync issues from enterprise customer threatening to cancel
suggested_reply: I sincerely apologize for the frustration you've experienced. Your concerns are completely valid, and I'm escalating this immediately. Here's what's happening right now: 1) I'm assigning a dedicated senior engineer to your case, 2) Our Customer Success Manager for enterprise accounts will call you within the next 2 hours, 3) I'm flagging your sync issue as P1 priority for our infrastructure team. You're absolutely right that enterprise customers deserve better, and we're committed to making this right. Expect a call from our team shortly.
